SKT_FIRST.name: Moonlight Slash
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and if the caster has a Barrier, deals an Additional Attack.\nAfter attacking, there is a <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> chance to trigger a Dual Attack by the ally with the highest Attack. If an Additional Attack occurs, the Dual Attack chance increases by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Activates an additional attack\nActivates Dual Attack with 1 ally
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 追加攻撃確定\n連携1体発生

description: Attacks an enemy, and if the caster has a Barrier, deals an Additional Attack.\nAfter attacking, there is a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000103_1_2]</color> chance to trigger a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack. If an Additional Attack occurs, the Dual Attack chance increases by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고, 실드를 보유한 상태라면 추가 공격을 입힙니다.\n공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 확률로 가장 공격력이 높은 아군의 협공을 발생시키며, 추가 공격 발생 시 협공 확률이 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、自分がシールド状態の場合、追加攻撃を与える。\n攻撃後、攻撃力が最も高い味方単体に<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>の確率で連携を発生させ、追加攻撃発生時、連携発生率が<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>UPする。

SKT_SECOND.name: Hero's Emergence
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Removes <color=#28d9ed>1</color> a debuff from all allies and grants a Barrier for <color=#28d9ed>2</color> turns. Barrier Strength increases proportionally to the caster's max Health.
description: Removes <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000103_2_1]</color> debuff(s) from all allies and grants a Barrier for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000103_2_2]</color> turns. Barrier Strength increases proportionally to the caster's max Health.

5_jp: 味方の行動ゲージUP+30%(自分を除く)

SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 아군 전체의 약화 효과를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제 후 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color>동안 실드를 부여합니다. 실드량은 자신의 최대 체력에 비례하여 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 味方全体の弱体効果を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除した後、シールドを<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。自分の最大HPが高いほどシールド量がUPする。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Someday I Will Reach the Moon
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. With a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance, grants <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>3</color> turns.
description: Attacks all enemies. With a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000103_3_1]</color> chance, grants <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000103_3_1]</color> turns.

5_jp: 強化不可強化(効果抵抗無視)

SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다. <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 대상 모두에게 <color=#28d9ed>3턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>강화 불가</color>를 부여합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。対象全体に<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>強化不可</color>を<color=#28d9ed>3ターン</color>の間付与する。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: Recovers <color=#28d9ed>25</color> Chain Points after attacking.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Grants a Barrier for 1 turn proportional to the caster's Max Health after attacking.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: Recovers <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000103_chain_1_1]</color> Chain Points after attacking.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Grants a Barrier for 1 turn proportional to the caster's Max Health after attacking.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>25</color>의 CP를 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신에게 1턴 동안 자신의 최대 체력에 비례하여 실드를 부여합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、CPを<color=#28d9ed>25</color>獲得する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、自分にシールドを1ターンの間付与する。自分の最大HPが高いほどシールド量がUPする。
